document_data.name: Chultan Fireswill
document_data.mainbody: '''Chultan Fireswill''' was a type of spirit from [[Chult]] in the [[Southwest Faer√ªn]]. It was exported to the [[Western Heartlands]], the lands along the [[River Chionthar]], and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Chultan Fireswill had a potent and fiery aroma of heavy [[spice]]s and high-proof alcohol. The drink possessed a powerful punch and was bottled in green opaque {{SI|1|lb|k|long=yes}} bottles with wide bottoms and tall thin neck.
